what_it_is: A gel-cream moisturiser to wake up to juicy skin: nourished, renewed, glowing.
what_it_does: This rich gel-cream moisturizer instantly hydrates, reducing the look of fine lines and wrinkles. In just one week, pores and dark spots look better, too. Keep using it, and your skin has never looked so juicy-smooth. The rich yet lightweight gel-cream infuses skin with a surge of instant—and 8-hour—hydration. This moisturising cream gets a boost from essential hyaluronic acid, and globally sourced Kalahari melon oil and baobab support deep hydration, helping to lock in moisture for plumper-looking skin. Fine lines and wrinkles instantly look better—and over time they improve, too.  Pores and dark spots look visibly improved in just one week. Over time, skin looks brighter and more even-toned. See more elasticity (aka more snap to your skin) in one week. The jar is refillable, and with its handy applicator (it’s in the cap), you can get your cream while keeping your nails out of the goop. It also has clean, fresh scent inspired by lush tropical fruits and flowers.

desc_summary:
Skin Type: Combination, Dry, Normal, Oily
Skin Concerns: Ageing, Dryness, Dullness, Pigmentation & Dark Spots, Uneven Skin Texture
Formulation: Cream
Skincare By Age: 20s, 30s, 40s, 50+, Under 20
what_it_is: A hydrating moisturizer that infuses skin with high-potency, advanced vitamin C (THD ascorbate) to fight the first visible signs of aging while providing powerful antioxidant support.
what_it_does: C.E.O. C + E Protect and Repair Moisturizer infuses five per cent advanced, oxygen-stable tetrahexydecyl ascorbate (THD ascorbate) into the skin—the gold standard form of vitamin C. THD ascorbate is the newer, clinically-proven, oil-soluble derivative of vitamin C, which penetrates better into the skin while being exceptionally stable against oxygenation. With 5 per cent THD ascorbate, this moisturizer is powerful at fighting the first visible signs of ageing and restoring vital skin radiance, while being uniquely suitable for those with sensitive skin, as THD ascorbate is significantly less irritating than other forms of vitamin C. Once in the skin, it helps boost youthful-looking skin texture and volume, in addition to providing photostable, antioxidant support. Blended with protective, anti-pollution expopolysaccharides and refining lime pearl extract, this formula visibly repairs the effects of ageing, environmental stress, and pollution-induced damage. It is rich yet never greasy, providing hydration and antioxidant protection to the skin for a visibly younger, softer, and healthier-looking complexion.

Over time, it helps control sebum production and gently exfoliates to visibly tighten pores and improve skin's clarity. Provides refreshing hydration for oily and acne-prone skin with a clean, non-greasy feel while potent ingredients help to fade discolouration and reduce redness from acne. The AHA/BHA Complex is a blend of Salicylic and Lactic Acids that gently exfoliates dead skin cells and pore-clogging debris that can lead to blemishes and breakouts. Amazonian White Clay deeply cleanses and detoxifies the skin and helps to absorb and remove excess oil that can lead to breakouts. Hyaluronic Acid works to attract, bind and retain moisture for hydrated skin. Squalane and Barley Extracts help rebuild the skin’s protective moisture barrier to prevent moisture loss.

Skin Concerns: Dryness, Oiliness
Formulation: Cream
Skincare By Age: 20s, 30s, 40s, 50+, Under 20
what_it_is: A matte moisturizing cream for combination to oily skin.
what_it_does:
Made with 90% natural-origin ingredients, Sephora Collection’s day cream with squalane is specially designed for combination to oily skin. It reduces excess sebum and limits shine without sacrificing hydration to give you smooth skin. It gives you a matte finish while intensely moisturizing your skin without leaving a greasy film.  It’s also a great makeup base. 

A cream with squalane that effectively creates a matte finish 
With 90% natural-origin ingredients, this mattifying day cream contains effective super ingredients: 
- Natural-origin squalane from olives is known for moisturizing. 
- Natural-origin hyaluronic acid, derived from wheat, is known to be a moisturizing ingredient. It helps skin to retain water and protects it from dehydration. 

A clinically proven matte moisturizing cream 
Made with 90% natural-origin ingredients, this matte moisturizing cream is non comedogenic and clinically proven to be suitable for all skin types. This product is fragrance-free because we wanted to concentrate on product effectiveness and star ingredients. 

A day cream for combination to oily skin developed using a responsible approach 
The tube for our matte moisturizing cream is made with 44% recycled plastic and can be recycled. As for the box, it’s made from cardboard produced from sustainably managed forests and printed with plant-based inks.

Hyaluronic acid from natural origin.

desc_summary:
Function: Treatment
Skin Type: Combination, Dry, Normal, Oily, Sensitive
Skin Concerns: Ageing, Dryness, Dullness, Fine Lines & Wrinkles
Formulation: Balm, Cream
Skincare By Age: 20s, 30s, 40s, 50+, Under 20
what_it_is: An anti-aging eye cream that melts to release a double shield of hydration with line-smoothing liquid silk and moisture-locking Japanese White Peony for radiant eyes.
what_it_does: Japanese White Peony Extract: Japanese White Peony is a special, pure white flower harvested in Niigata, Japan, that has been treasured for centuries. It helps strengthen the skin barrier function, providing a “seal” that enables the thinnest skin around the eye area to retain moisture for reduced dryness and sensitivity.  Silk Extract includes the two proteins that comprise silk, sericin and fibroin, that together closely parallel the amino acid structure of human skin. This complete protein provides a protective veil of hydration like a second skin without weighing it down, revealing a lustrous glow. The Silk Peony contains 30% Hadasei-3™, our signature trio of pure Japanese superfoods, double fermented to yield essential skin nutrients for visibly radiant eyes. Uji Green Tea is known to detoxify and help reduce premature signs of ageing, Okinawa mozuku algae is packed with polysaccharides essential for skin water retention and renewal, and protein-rich Akita rice nourishes and moisturises.

pdt_name: Essential Hydration Cream with Rose Geranium and Vitamin E
unique_id: ALPHA-H-Essential Hydration Cream with Rose Geranium and Vitamin E
desc_summary:
Skin Type: Combination, Dry, Normal, Oily, Sensitive
Skin Concerns: Dryness
Formulation: Cream
Skincare By Age: 20s, 30s, 40s, 50+
what_it_is: An aromatic, soothing moisturiser formulated with a unique blend of essential oils, bio-active sea minerals and essential fatty acids to replenish and revitalise parched skin while aiding in moisture retention for longer lasting and more sustainable hydration
what_it_does: This soothing moisturiser does not contain actives or Glycolic Acid so it is perfect for even the most sensitive skins. It combines a range of soothing and healing ingredients to bring immediate relief and comfort to dry and irritated skins. It is great for those with broken capillaries, diffused redness, skin sensitivities and inflammation. It is also suitable to help calm rosacea, eczema and dermatitis-prone skins. Water is essential for cellular life, so a well-moisturised skin with properly functioning cells is both healthy and younger-looking. If the skin has been damaged or irritated, leaving its lipid barrier impaired, it cannot begin to heal until such time as the lipid barrier is repaired and moisture loss is stopped. Essential Hydration Cream can help to heal and return balance to the skin’s lipid barrier by nourishing and protecting dry and delicate skins. Arnica, Cypress, Malt and Solomon’s Seal combine in a powerful anti-redness complex which provides anti-inflammatory properties, whilst also strengthening the walls of the capillaries to diffuse redness in the skin. High in trace minerals, calcium, manganese, zinc and magnesium, Red Algae Extract contains highly concentrated micronutrients which help the skin to metabolise vitamins and activates the skin’s enzymatic processes. Rose Geranium adds not only a beautiful calming scent but also has anti-fungal properties.

what_it_does: This moisturiser strengthens the skin’s moisture barrier that has been weakened by life’s unavoidable stressors to help reduce skin’s sensitivity and signs of ageing such as dry patches, dullness, and dehydration. Daily stress can negatively impact the skin, breaking down collagen and starving skin of essential nutrients. Boost your skin’s ability to cope by treating it with a powerful microencapsulated cocktail of superfoods, adaptogens and niacinamide (B3). Avocado, kiwi, cordyceps mushroom and kakadu plum help increase resilience by repairing the skin barrier and replenishing essential nutrients for a stronger, hydrated, healthier-looking complexion.

what_it_is: A Sephora exclusive featuring your skincare favourites from Caudalie.
what_it_does: This set features 3 products from Caudalie. Vinoperfect Radiance Serum brightens and evens the complexion whilst correcting dark spots. Both effective and natural, this anti-dark spot serum contains our patented Viniferine that is 62 times more effective than Vitamin C at boosting radiance and evening the complexion. Suitable for all skin types, it works to reduce the appearance of dark spots, including pregnancy mask, acne marks, sun pigmentation and age-related dark spots, and prevents them from reappearing. Vinosource-Hydra Moisturizing Sorbet melts into the skin upon contact, leaving it moisturised, soothed and strengthened. The skin is immediately hydrated and soothed, whilst redness is reduced. Vinopure Cleansing Gel purifies the skin and tightens pores while minimizing excess sebum, blackheads and imperfections. The gentle non-drying formula features natural salicylic acid, grapeseed polyphenols, organic* essential oils, redness-reducing grape water, plus organic rose water to promote a healthy glow.

what_it_is: A hand serum to say goodbye to dry cracked hands from harsh sanitisers and frequent hand-washing.

The Cica and polypeptides in the formula also provide antioxidant and help to build collagen and elastin. Each ingredient is protected from oxidation with Skin Inc's signature Proprietary Encapsulation Technology.  Envelop your hands in a lovely, soothing lavender scent and enjoy 100 hand spas in a bottle with this skin saviour. It is suitable for even the most sensitive of skin types. And it's also the perfect size to pop in your handbag or pocket, so you can always have it with you on the go!

unique_id: CLE DE PEAU-Protective Fortifying Cream Refill
desc_summary:
Skin Type: Combination, Dry, Normal, Oily
Skin Concerns: Dryness, Uneven Skin Texture
Formulation: Cream
Skincare By Age: 20s, 30s, 40s, 50+, Under 20
Benefits: Sun Protection
what_it_is: A daytime cream hydrated with UV protection to boost Skin Intelligence and provide a smooth-feeling, adherent base for foundation.
what_it_does: Based on decades of research, Clé de Peau Beauté unlocks the power of Skin Intelligence – your skin’s innate ability to distinguish between good and bad stimuli, to achieve and maintain its ideal condition. Drawing from this knowledge and using state-of-the-art technology, its exclusive ingredient, Skin-Empowering Illuminator, was specially developed to enhance skin’s intuitive ability to repair and defend itself, for the most radiantly youthful look.  It contains Ononis Spinosa Root extract and Abelmoschus Esculentus extract, which intensively target specific collagens and proteins that are critical to the skin. The intensely rich texture instantly absorbs into skin, indulging it with all the dewy moisture it craves. The subtle, elegant fragrance of rare orchid and natural rose surrounds you with its delicate scent.

what_it_does: This emulsion provides a smooth-feeling, adherent base for foundation, improving its lasting power and finish. It empowers skin to evolve in radiance with continuous use. Based on decades of research, Clé de Peau BEAUTÉ unlocks the power of Skin Intelligence – skin’s innate ability to distinguish between good and bad stimuli, to achieve and maintain its ideal condition. Drawing from this knowledge and using state-of-the-art technology, Skin-Empowering Illuminator, was specially developed to enhance skin’s intuitive ability to repair and defend itself, for the most radiantly youthful look. It thoroughly nourishes skin with lightweight moisture throughout the day for optimally radiant, youthful-looking skin. Helps strengthen skin’s resilience from within for plump, supple skin with reduced visible fine lines. It retexturises skin for the feel of a smoother surface, improving the adherence, lasting power and finish of foundation. Protects against daily skin damage caused by UV rays and a loss of hydration. With continued use, helps activate and maintain skin’s vitality, and empowers its ability to evolve in radiance day by day. Adopting cutting-edge science to regulate skin’s daytime rhythms, this emulsion helps enhance skin’s ability to draw moisture from within to strengthen its regenerative powers. Contains Ononis Spinosa Root extract and Abelmoschus Esculentus extract, which intensively target specific collagens and proteins that are critical to the skin. This fresh, light texture instantly absorbs into skin, indulging it with all the dewy moisture it craves. The subtle, elegant fragrance of rare orchid and natural rose surrounds you with its delicate scent.

The antioxidant-rich fruits of this fragrant blossom can balance skin and diminish the look of pores. Found on the cool hillsides of Japan, Japanese Leopard Lily has been prized for centuries. Used to decorate the streets of Kyoto’s geisha district during the Gion Festival, Japanese Leopard Lily has earned the name “the flower of Kyoto.” We’ve harnessed its special powers to help minimise excess oil production, calm problem skin, and promote turnover of the skin. what_it_does: There’s cream, and then there’s Premier Cru Cream. The foundation of the entire Premier Cru line, it took seven years to perfect the elegant, naturally sourced, highly active formula. Referred to as the crème de la crème, it’s the ultimate one hit wonder to brighten, tighten, plump, smooth and nourish in one luxurious step. Caudalie’s clinically proven, powerhouse patents address all signs of ageeing: resveratrol lifts and firms, Viniferine® brightens and grape seed polyphenols protect against environmental aggressors. Plumping peptides help to support collagen synthesis, while naturally-sourced grape and sesame seed oils deeply nourish and hydrate. The cream’s buttery texture melts into the skin, leaving it well hydrated and velvety-smooth to the touch. There’s nothing quite like it; the results—a 98 percent reduction in wrinkles and a 98 percent increased firmness—speak for themselves.
